name: TANZGIO
description:
Oops I accidentally failed English because my words got all twisted up and now I can only remember 7 letters. Help me to recover my vocab please!

Rules: Draw lines to form as many words as possible from the word bank; the line cannot intersect itself or the word bank. You cannot use a word more than once.

Controls:
Mouse down - start drawing

Move mouse - draw line

Mouse up - stops drawing and checks the word

Click reset - resets the score and chooses a new word bank

Note: The value of a word is the number of characters in it.
